item.title: Matplotlib

item.title: Python错误处理的细节
item.description: 错误处理的一些可记细节 try except finally continue和break不会影响异常处理机制 def test(): while True: try: a = 1/0 except Exception as e: print ("exception") continue finally: print ("finally") print ("out of try") if __name__ == '__main__': test() //输出 exception
